articles.content:
National Cooperation Called for in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The Reunification Solidarity of south Korea released a statement on Jan. 31, calling for achieving national cooperation
by uniting around the South Side's Preparatory Committee for a Joint Function of the People in the South, the North and Overseas to Implement the June 15 Joint Declaration.
 Referring to the formation of the south side's preparatory committee, the statement said the committee would play an important part in paving the way for reunification by the efforts of the Korean nation by invariably holding fast to and implementing the June 15 joint declaration which is a declaration of national independence and a declaration of peaceful reunification and great national unity.    
 Now the people, who are inspired by the declaration and ardently desire the country's reunification, have become able to unite around the south side's preparatory committee and discharge their patriotic mission, the statement said, calling for glorifying this year without fail as a year of a turn in the drive for the independent reunification of the country.

Russian Dancing Troupe Here 
    Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The State Academy Beriozka Dancing Troupe of Russia Named after N. S. Nadezhdina led by its Director Mira Koltsova arrived here Sunday.
 It was met at the airport by Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and staff members of the Russian embassy here.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Abbas
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Diplomatic Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Abbas
    Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority who is chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on the occasion of his birthday.
It was conveyed to DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun by Palestinian Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah on Feb. 7.

articles.title: Lunar New Year's Day, Greatest Folk Holiday of Korean People
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Diplomatic Corps
    Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps here with the approach of his birthday.
 Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian ambassador who is doyen of the corps, handed them to Paek Nam Sun, DPRK foreign minister, on Monday.
